span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripDropDown1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripDropDown1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息处理对话框键，如选项卡，返回时，转义符和箭头键在预处理过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box keys, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys. 仅当调用此方法方法指示该控件未在处理该键。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只需将字符发送到的父方法或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。The simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件时，只能调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以便为控件提供机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 该方法应确定是否在控件处于处理助记键的状态，是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 此方法的实现通常使用方法，以确定给定的字符是否匹配控件的文本中的助记键。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如:For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 此默认实现方法仅返回`false`以指示该控件具有没有助记键。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 button 类的扩展方法以显示自定义行为。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 该示例还演示如何使用和属性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要运行此示例中，将窗体类，同一文件中后面粘贴以下代码。To run this example, paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 添加的按钮类型的`MnemonicButton`到窗体。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form.
